attributes.action: Name criminal suspects in spite of their age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To many youngsters are involved in criminal activity nowadays  but are still protected under the children act simply because they are under 16 years of age I propose that the law shoud be changed to that of a person who is the age of 14 years can be named by police as a suspect in any criminal activity

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
